post.body: what ARE you doing for the day(s) off?
let the original content holders know to resubmit their stuff for PSone EMU is the quicker route. On the unofficial side. ahem.
it's not SCEA that has to get the message. Titles that end up on the store front have to be licensed by the original licensee.
wait, the book gets one panel in a comic and its sold out everywhere? Damn.
Oh I still have your copies of Rising and Dead Sea, most excellent, I might add
Because for Billy, he wants you to truly believe its an E-Ticket ride
G'night twitterdom.
New favorite nickname: Toots Pumpkin.
Two days latter and I'm still feeling the 110 KTEs that @pirafu and I struggled through. Ugh my abs...
Merry Holiday everyone! Breaking into the winter ale sampler pack soon. Very soon...
I for real just opened a vegetarian haggis from my gran. Let's hear it for vegie Scottland.
Besides myself, the train station is completely vacant. Suddenly things feel very surreal...
Settled for a some seitan at Spipz. Now there is now need to stabity.
I might be willing to stab someone for a vegan doughnut right about now. And some soynog. Also, Frangelica or Kahluha to go in it.
The gym was completely deserted. Set a new personal best on the JonesCrawl = 3x(10x DeadLifts @205#+ 25x Boxjumps @24") 8minutes 31 seconds
Few things are less comfortable than shaving last week's beard with last months razor...
Ok g'night for real this time. Ja matta!
has eaten far too many cookies and drunk far too much vino. G'night
Wow, suddenly everyone's all up ons World War Z, two years after it was published and we of the zombie faithful were saying twas awesome...
I find it interesting that female aliens, who almost always are super models, find clothing difficult. Case in point: http://icanhaz.com/pjs
